name: locus
description: AI-powered project planning with 40+ skills: Vision -> Features -> Design -> Build
author: swiggityswerve

locus.description: Start or resume a project (Vision -> Features -> Design -> Build)
locus.template:
Read and follow the skill at skills/using-locus/SKILL.md to help the user plan their project.

If they provided a project idea: $ARGUMENTS
Start with Step 1: Vision.

If no idea provided, ask what they want to build.

locus-skills.template:
List the available Locus skills by reading the skills/ directory structure.

Categories:
- 01-executive-suite: CEO, CTO, CPO, CFO, COO
- 02-product-management: Product manager, project manager, etc.
- 03-engineering-leadership: Tech lead, staff engineer, etc.
- 04-developer-specializations: Frontend, backend, devops, data, AI
- 05-specialists: Compliance, etc.

If user specified a filter: $ARGUMENTS

locus-skill.template:
Read and follow the skill: skills/$ARGUMENTS/SKILL.md

If no skill specified, list available skills from the skills/ directory.
